text: (Allah) phan bao (Adam): “Nay Adam, Nguoi hay cho Ho biet ten goi cua chung.” Roi khi Adam cho cac Thien Than biet ten goi cua tat ca moi thu, Allah phan (voi cac Thien Than): “Chang phai TA đa bao cac nguoi rang TA biet đieu vo hinh cua cac tang troi va trai đat va TA biet ro đieu cac nguoi phoi bay va giau kin hay sao?!”
